$count = 0
RSpec.describe "let" do
  let(:count) { $count += 1 }

    expect(count).to eq(2)

$count = 0
RSpec.describe "let!" do
  invocation_order = []

  let!(:count) do
    invocation_order << :let!
    $count += 1
  end

  it "calls the helper method in a before hook" do
    invocation_order << :example
    expect(invocation_order).to eq([:let!, :example])
    expect(count).to eq(1)
  end
end

ç¢ºã‹ã«ã€å˜ãªã‚‹å¤‰æ•°æŸç¸›ã¨ã®é•ã„ãŒåˆ†ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„çŠ¶æ…‹ã§ã¯ã€åˆã‚ã¦RSpecã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’è¦‹ãŸæ™‚ã®ã‚«ã‚ªã‚¹æ„Ÿã®å¤§ããªè¦å› ã®ä¸€ã¤ã¨ã‚‚æ€ãˆã¾ã™ï¼ˆå®Ÿéš›æ€ã£ã¦ã¾ã—ãŸï¼‰

å…ˆç¨‹æŒ™ã’ãŸå…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã®ä¸­ã«ã¯ã€ã“ã‚“ãªè¨€åŠã‚‚ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

Note that let is lazy-evaluated: it is not evaluated until the first time the method it defines is invoked.

ãªã‚‹ã»ã©ã€ã©ã†ã‚„ã‚‰ letÂ ã¯é…å»¶è©•ä¾¡ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã“ã§ã€ã‚ã‚‹æ€ã„ãŒé ­ã‚’ã‚ˆãã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ã€Œletã¯subjectã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸæ™‚ã«åŠ¹æœã‚’ç™ºæ®ã™ã‚‹ã®ã§ã¯ãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ»ï¼Ÿã€

è©¦ã—ã«æ›¸ã„ã¦ã¿ãŸ

ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå¯¾è±¡ã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã¯ã€å¼•æ•°ã¨ã—ã¦ä¸ãˆã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸåŒã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®æ€§åˆ¥ã‹ã‚‰ç•°ãªã£ãŸæ–‡è¨€ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦æŒ¨æ‹¶ã‚’è¿”ã™æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªç‰©ã¨ã—ã¾ã™:

class Person
  SEX_MALE = 1
  SEX_FEMALE = 2

  attr_reader :name, :sex

  def initialize(name, sex)
    @name = name
    @sex = sex
  end

  # @param [Person] to_be_greeted
  def greet(to_be_greeted)
    title = to_be_greeted.sex == SEX_MALE ? "Mr." : "Ms."

    "Hi, #{title}#{to_be_greeted.name}, my name is #{@name}. It's a pleasure to meet you."
  end
end

ã“ã‚Œã«å¯¾ã—ã¦ã€RSpecã¯æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸ:

RSpec.describe Person do
  describe "#greet" do
    let(:person) { Person.new("Issei", Person::SEX_MALE) }

    subject { person.greet(to_be_greeted) }

    context "with a male person" do
      let(:to_be_greeted) { Person.new("Taro", Person::SEX_MALE) }

      it { is_expected.to eq "Hi, Mr.Taro, my name is Issei. It's a pleasure to meet you." }
    end

    context "with a female person" do
      let(:to_be_greeted) { Person.new("Hanako", Person::SEX_FEMALE) }

      it { is_expected.to eq "Hi, Ms.Hanako, my name is Issei. It's a pleasure to meet you." }
    end
  end
end

å› ã¿ã«ã€ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’ä½¿ã†å ´åˆã‚‚åŒæ§˜ã«ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚åŒã˜ãPersonã‚’ä¾‹ã«ã™ã‚‹ã¨:
